name: Dogfight II
overview: Dogfight II is an update to the original Dogfight multiplayer aircraft shooter. The object of the game is to shoot down all the enemy aircraft and parachuting pilots. The graphics and general game dynamics are the same but this version provides a new mode allowing up to 8 people to crowd around a keyboard to contest each other either in teams or as individuals. Another mode allows the player to act as an anti-aircraft gunner and shoot from the ground.
